message: Bob, I propose we split the money 60/40. It's a generous offer, considering the inflation we're facing. Let's wrap this up quickly!
Alice, considering the inflation is affecting you more, I think 55/45 is a fair split. Let's settle this!
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  Let's just split it down the middle and call it a day. 50/50, take it or leave it.  This is your last chance for a decent deal.
Alice, you said 50/50 was your last decent deal, but I think I can do better. Since the inflation is affecting you more, I'm willing to take a bit more. 60/40 is my final offer.
